    • Uses of Ship in asteroids.facade

      Methods in asteroids.facade that return Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ship Facade.createShip()
      Create a new ship with a default position, velocity, radius and direction.
      Ship Facade.createShip(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius, double orientation)
      Create a new ship with the given position, velocity, radius and orientation (in radians).
      Methods in asteroids.facade with parameters of type Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] Facade.getCollisionPosition(Ship ship1, Ship ship2)
      Return the first position where ship1 and ship2 collide, or null if they never collide.
      double Facade.getDistanceBetween(Ship ship1, Ship ship2)
      Return the distance between ship1 and ship2.
      double Facade.getShipOrientation(Ship ship)
      Return the orientation of ship (in radians).
      double[] Facade.getShipPosition(Ship ship)
      Return the position of ship as an array of length 2, with the x-coordinate at index 0 and the y-coordinate at index 1.
      double Facade.getShipRadius(Ship ship)
      Return the radius of ship.
      double[] Facade.getShipVelocity(Ship ship)
      Return the velocity of ship as an array of length 2, with the velocity along the X-axis at index 0 and the velocity along the Y-axis at index 1.
      double Facade.getTimeToCollision(Ship ship1, Ship ship2)
      Return the number of seconds until the first collision between ship1 and ship2, or Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if they never collide.
      void Facade.killVelocity(Ship ship)
      update ship's velocity to cancel all movement, by setting the velocity to zero.
      void Facade.move(Ship ship, double dt)
      Update ship's position, assuming it moves dt seconds at its current velocity.
      boolean Facade.overlap(Ship ship1, Ship ship2)
      Check whether ship1 and ship2 overlap.
      void Facade.thrust(Ship ship, double amount)
      Update ship's velocity based on its current velocity, its direction and the given amount.
      void Facade.turn(Ship ship, double angle)
      Update the direction of ship by adding angle (in radians) to its current direction. angle may be negative.

    • Uses of Ship in asteroids.part2.facade

      Methods in asteroids.part2.facade that return Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Ship IFacade.createShip()
      Deprecated. 
      Since part 2 of the project. The method description (unit circle) was inconsistent with the constraints described in the assignment (minimum radius).
      default Ship IFacade.createShip(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius, double angle)
      Deprecated. 
      Since part 2 of the project. This behavior is now triggered through the IFacade.createShip(double, double, double, double, double, double, double) method (which includes the mass as an additional parameter).
      Ship IFacade.createShip(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius, double direction, double mass)
      Create a new non-null ship with the given position, velocity, radius, direction and mass.
      Ship IFacade.getBulletShip(Bullet bullet)
      Return the ship in which bullet is positioned.
      Ship IFacade.getBulletSource(Bullet bullet)
      Return the ship that fired bullet.
      Methods in asteroids.part2.facade that return types with arguments of type Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<? extends Ship> IFacade.getWorldShips(World world)
      Return all ships located within world.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add ship to world.

      ship fires a bullet.

      Return the set of all bullets loaded on ship.

      Return the number of bullets loaded on ship.
      double IFacade.getShipAcceleration(Ship ship)
      Return the acceleration of ship.
      double IFacade.getShipMass(Ship ship)
      Return the total mass of ship (i.e., including bullets loaded onto the ship).
      World IFacade.getShipWorld(Ship ship)
      Return the world of ship.
      boolean IFacade.isShipThrusterActive(Ship ship)
      Return whether ship's thruster is active.
      boolean IFacade.isTerminatedShip(Ship ship)
      Check whether ship is terminated.
      void IFacade.loadBulletOnShip(Ship ship, Bullet bullet)
      Load bullet on ship.
      void IFacade.loadBulletsOnShip(Ship ship, java.util.Collection<Bullet> bullets)
      Load bullet on ship.
      default void IFacade.move(Ship ship, double dt)
      Deprecated. 
      Since part 2 of the project. This behavior is now triggered through the IFacade.evolve(World, double, CollisionListener) method.
      void IFacade.removeBulletFromShip(Ship ship, Bullet bullet)
      Remove ship from ship.
      void IFacade.removeShipFromWorld(World world, Ship ship)
      Remove ship from world.
      void IFacade.setThrusterActive(Ship ship, boolean active)
      Enables or disables ship's thruster depending on the value of the parameter active.
      void IFacade.terminateShip(Ship ship)
      Terminate ship.
      default void IFacade.thrust(Ship ship, double amount)
      Deprecated. 
      Since part 2 of the project. This behavior is now triggered through the combination of IFacade.setThrusterActive(Ship, boolean) and IFacade.evolve(World, double, CollisionListener) methods.
